= Standard =
	== Substitution ==
		:%s/foo/bar/g - Find all occurance of foo and change them to bar
		:%s/foo/bar/gc - Ask for confirmation
		:%s/\<foo\>/bar/g - Replace only whole foo
		:%s/foo/bar/gi - Case insensitive 
	
	== Searching ==
		/word will find all occurances of the word word
			- n : Next occurance of the word
			- N : Previous
